lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Hey there — I’m with Cascade Tree Works. We’re in the neighborhood doing quick safety checks and free estimates. Anything you’ve been putting off with your trees?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Totally get it — many neighbors start with a quick look so they know what’s urgent vs. what can wait.

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: No pressure today; we can leave a note with recommendations and you can decide later.
